mapper.select: SELECT q.id as q_id,q.title,q.type,q.multi,q.category_id,q.difficulty,q.score,q.analysis, qc.id as qc_id,qc.question_id,qc.content,qc.is_correct,qc.sort, qa.id as qa_id,qa.question_id as qc_question_id,qa.answer FROM questions q LEFT JOIN question_choices qc ON q.id = qc.question_id AND qc.is_deleted=0 LEFT JOIN question_answers qa on q.id = qa.question_id AND qa.is_deleted=0 WHERE q.is_deleted=0 AND q.id = #{id} ORDER BY qc.sort
